an5.224:1.3: Avasamacchari hoti, kulamacchari hoti, labhamacchari hoti, vannamacchari hoti, dhammamacchari hoti.
an5.224:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca adinava atinivase.
an5.224:2.3: Na avasamacchari hoti, na kulamacchari hoti, na labhamacchari hoti, na vannamacchari hoti, na dhammamacchari hoti.
an5.224:2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca anisamsa samavatthavase”ti.
